mapper.select: select c.cart_no, c.quantity, c.product_no, c.member_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_img from cart c join product p on p.product_no = p.product_no where member_no = #{memberNo} order by 1
mapper.update: update cart set quantity = #{quantity} where cart_no = #{cartNo}
mapper.select: select * from cart where member_no = #{memberNo} and product_no = #{proNo}
